resources.string: Discover resources, creatures, and elements from the Minecraft world.
A magical biome full of giant mushrooms and unique creatures. Mushrooms glow in the dark.
Cold forests with towering spruce trees and wolves. Ideal for getting dark wood.
Dense and humid vegetation. Home to ocelots, parrots, and hidden temples.
Warm plains with yellow grass and acacia trees. Villages are common here.
Automatically generated constructions in the world. Contain treasures and dangers.
Hostile and friendly creatures that inhabit different biomes.
Elements you can obtain and use in your inventory.
Characteristic flora of each biome. From cacti to ferns.
Unique creature from the mushroom biome. It is passive and can be sheared.
A rare variant of the mooshroom that appears when it is struck by lightning.
Underground structure full of glowing mushrooms.
Edible resource. You can use them to make stew.
A special dirt block where fungi grow naturally.
Typical vegetation. You can grow them with bone meal.
Nutritious food obtained directly from Mooshrooms using a bowl.
Tameable creature. Protect yourself with bones to have a companion.
A nocturnal animal that often carries items in its mouth. It loves berries.
Generated structure with spruce wood architecture.
A watchtower inhabited by hostile Illagers armed with crossbows.
An extremely dangerous place inhabited by Evokers and Vindicators; it serves as a base to obtain the Totem of Undying, valuable loot, and to challenge intense battles.
Small snow structure that sometimes hides a secret basement with a zombie villager.
Dark-colored wood resource. Ideal for rustic constructions.
A thorny bush that provides food but slows you down when walking through it.
Decorative plant that thrives in the shady and humid floors of the taiga.
Tall, slender trees characteristic of the taiga.
Wild jungle creature. Scares away creepers.
A colorful bird that mimics the sounds of nearby mobs.
A peaceful creature that spends its day eating bamboo and rolling around.
Structure with dispenser traps and hidden chests.
A warm, reddish wood type obtained from the giant trees found in jungle biomes.
Refreshing fruit that grows naturally on the jungle floor.
Fast-growing plant resource. Useful for scaffolding.
A fruit that grows on jungle logs, essential for making cookies.
Climbing vegetation. You can climb them without needing ladders.
Tameable creature. The fastest means of transportation.
A pack animal that can carry chests and spits if it feels threatened.
A timid creature that rolls into a ball. It drops scutes for armor.
Acacia constructions typical of warm plains.
Long, yellowish grass that covers the savanna plains.
Flat-topped trees characteristic of the savanna.
